data.message:
Mouad Belrhouat a moroccan rapper 
known as L7A9ED was arrested before a soccer play 
accused of selling tickets in black market !
the main cause is not that !
the main cause is that he sing against the system !
and the moroccan regime use other
 justifications to arrest people like him
so that we dont say he is a «political prisonner» 
please share as much as you can
to make his cause known around the world
and to stop crimes against freedom of speech !
